# Cost Prediction Dashboard

Predictive analytics dashboard showing estimated costs for planned workloads. Uses ML to forecast spot prices and suggest optimal timing.

## Rationale
Builds on existing price prediction service. Addresses budget planning needs. Differentiates from competitors with no cost forecasting. Helps users time spot purchases.

## User Stories
- As a budget-conscious user, I want to forecast my GPU costs so that I can plan my monthly spending
- As a researcher, I want to know the best time to run my training job so that I minimize costs

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Forecast costs for next 7 days based on usage patterns
- [ ] Show optimal timing for planned jobs
- [ ] Budget alerts when forecasted spending exceeds threshold
- [ ] Historical accuracy tracking for predictions
- [ ] Integration with calendar for scheduled workloads
